disrupt.name: Disrupt
disrupt.desc: Cause Blast even if the hit is saved

ignore-cover.name: Ignore Cover
ignore-cover.desc: Ignore cover modifiers and infantry cover saves.

single-shot.name: Single Shot
single-shot.desc: May be used once per battle.

slow-firing.name: Slow Firing
slow-firing.desc: Must take one turn to reload after each use.

indirect.name: Indirect
indirect.desc: May fire without LoS and double range (but minimum of 30cm) during sustined fire actions.
